content: Can you provide a comprehensive list of animal welfare charities that focus on rehabilitating injured animals and protecting endangered species? Specifically, I am looking for organizations that prioritize preserving the natural habitats of these species. In addition to the XML data for the World Animal Protection charity provided, can you suggest other well-known charities that align with these criteria? Your response should include details such as the organization's mission, location, website, and donation link. Please ensure that the suggested charities have a proven track record of success in their efforts to protect wildlife and their habitats.

Certainly! Here is a list of well-known animal welfare charities that focus on rehabilitating injured animals, protecting endangered species, and preserving their natural habitats:

### 1. **World Wildlife Fund (WWF)**
- **Mission**: WWF's mission is to conserve nature and reduce the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth.
- **Location**: Headquartered in Gland, Switzerland.
- **Website**: [wwf.org](https://www.worldwildlife.org)
- **Donation Link**: [Donate to WWF](https://support.worldwildlife.org/site/SPageServer?pagename=main_monthly&s_src=AWE1800OQ5G&gclid=CjwKCAiA9NGfBhBvEiwAq5vSy9U3sU8v56e5VhY1st_DF3Q3V1g5Fb4k5Mmd5yOltEJrKxJw8i5HNRoCw7gQAvD_BwE)
- **Track Record**: WWF has been working for over 60 years to protect wildlife and their habitats worldwide.

### 2. **International Fund for Animal Welfare (IFAW)**
- **Mission**: IFAW rescues and protects animals around the world, focusing on animals in crisis, conserving wildlife habitat, and advocating for better laws and enforcement.
- **Location**: Headquarters in Washington D.C., USA.
- **Website**: [ifaw.org](https://www.ifaw.org)
- **Donation Link**: [Donate to IFAW](https://secured.ifaw.org/crisis)
- **Track Record**: IFAW has been actively involved in wildlife conservation and animal welfare for over 50 years, with a strong focus on habitat conservation.

### 3. **Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS)**
- **Mission**: WCS saves wildlife and wild places worldwide through science, conservation action, education, and inspiring people to value nature.
- **Location**: Headquartered in New York, USA.
- **Website**: [wcs.org](https://www.wcs.org)
- **Donation Link**: [Donate to WCS](https://www.wcs.org/give)
- **Track Record**: WCS manages about 500 conservation projects in more than 60 countries and educates millions of people on the importance of wildlife conservation.

### 4. **The Nature Conservancy**
- **Mission**: To conserve the lands and waters on which all life depends.
- **Location**: Arlington, Virginia, USA.
- **Website**: [nature.org](https://www.nature.org)
- **Donation Link**: [Donate to The Nature Conservancy](https://www.nature.org/en-us/membership-and-giving/donate-to-our-mission/)
- **Track Record**: The Nature Conservancy has protected more than 125 million acres of land and thousands of miles of rivers worldwide.

### 5. **Born Free Foundation**
- **Mission**: Born Free works to ensure that all wild animals, whether living in captivity or in the wild, are treated with compassion and respect and are able to live their lives according to their needs.
- **Location**: Horsham, United Kingdom.
- **Website**: [bornfree.org.uk](https://www.bornfree.org.uk)
- **Donation Link**: [Donate to Born Free Foundation](https://www.bornfree.org.uk/donate)
- **Track Record**: Born Free has been combating wildlife exploitation and protecting threatened species in their natural habitats for over 35 years.

These organizations are globally recognized for their efforts in wildlife conservation and habitat preservation. They have proven track records and provide various ways for individuals to contribute to their cause.
